verify.title: Account Linking.
verify.description: You can verify your Warframe Market account by sending a dm to [VaporTrader](https://warframe.market/profile/VaporTrader) and hitting the "send message" button. the content of the message should only be the code below.

success.title: Account Unlinked
success.description: Your account has been fully unlinked from your Discord user. You can re-link your account by using `$PREFIXverify` at any time.

success.title: Profile configuration synchronized
success.description: Your platform, region, and language have all been synchronized successfully!

failure.title: Error
failure.description:
Your Warframe Market account must be linked to your Discord account to perform this action.
You can link them by using the `$PREFIXverify` command and following the provided instructions

price.title: Price Information - $ITEMNAME
price.description:
__**Overall Statistics:**__
Average: $AVERAGE <:vaportrader:757687668522877009>
Highest: $HIGH <:platinum:757676262708871257>
Lowest: $LOW <:platinum:757676262708871257>
Orders (buy/sell):  $BUYERS/$SELLERS
Utilization*: $CAP%
Price Trend: $TREND
Price Trend (90 days): $90TREND
[View on warframe.market](https://warframe.market/items/$ITEMURL)
price.footer: These prices may not always be attainable prices on the market, they are averages of the orders currently listing this item

errors.tooManyItems: Cannot Query more than 5 items at a time

relic_drops.title: Relic Information
relic_drops.description:
__**Information inaccurate as of most recent patch, do not take as gospel**__
Drops for $RELIC_NAME:
:warning: Symbolizes that this item is __potentially__ vaulted
:grey_exclamation: Symbolizes that an item could be vaulted, but at this time the bot is uncertain about it

__**If there are any items with :grey_exclamation: next to them**__, please write in the support channel in the support server telling me which relic they are showing for, thank you.

info.title: Information
info.description:
Servers: $SERVER_COUNT
Latency: $LATENCY ms
Items: $ITEM_COUNT
Users Cached: $USER_CACHE
Users Verified: $USERS_VERIFIED

[Support Server](https://discord.gg/wFKHNUz) (discord.gg)

search.title: Search Results
search.footer:
These prices are not indicative of current trade value, they are averages over a 3 month period.
Please keep this in mind.

descriptions.moreThan9: Your search for `$SEARCH_TERM` returned $RESULT_COUNT results, showing results 1 - 9.

credits.description: These awesome people are all the ones you should really be thanking for making this bot possible, without their help, feedback, and suggestions this bot would not be anywhere close to as good as it has become.

field3.title: Backend:
field3.description: The whole 42Bytes team for having an amazing API for me to draw data from.

endAlert.title: Price Alert Cancelled
endAlert.description: You will no longer receive price notifications on this item

errors.UserNotSubscribed: You dont have any active price alerts for $ITEM_NAME.
errors.DatabaseError: The database encountered a problem, maybe try again?

startAlert.title: Price Alert Created
startAlert.description: You will begin to receive price notifications on this item

errors.UserNotSubscribed: You already have an active price alert for $ITEM_NAME.
errors.DatabaseError: The database encountered a problem, maybe try again?

unRecognizedPlatform.title: Error
unRecognizedPlatform.description: The platform you specified ($PLATFORM) is not recognized, please try again.

alerts.title: Price Alert! (Beta)
alerts.footer: If you got your item successfully, consider cancelling your price alert to stop future messages like this
alerts.description:
Your price alert on the $ITEM_NAME has been triggered!

Contact the $BUYER_FORMATTED with the following message:

`/whisper $INGAME_NAME Hi! I $WTS-B $ITEM_NAME for $PRICE :platinum: (Powered by: Vapor Trader)`

multiUserAlert.title: WARNING
multiUserAlert.singular: You are competing against approximately 1 other person for this price alert.
multiUserAlert.plural: You are competing against approximately $OTHER_SUBSCRIBERS other people for this price alert.
